subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Brice Johnson had 18 points on 8-for-10 shooting and 9 rebounds, and No. 24 North Carolina used its stout defense Saturday to hold off No. 12 Ohio State for an 82-74 victory in Chicago.
snippet: Brice Johnson had 18 points on 8-for-10 shooting and 9 rebounds, and No. 24 North Carolina used its stout defense Saturday to hold off No. 12 Ohio State for an 82-74 victory in Chicago.
